natural solution: Rotating the point $(1,0)$ about the origin by $90^\circ$ counterclockwise gives us the point $(0,1)$, so $\sin 90^\circ = \boxed{1}$.

 *)

theorem

 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
